item.title: Creating a Github Codespace
item.description: Setting up your Codespace   Download and install Visual Studio Code if you haven’t already Visit the Github page for the ceda site (note: this also works for any public directory) Make sure you’re logged into Github

item.title: Editing guide
item.description: Introduction   This site is built with a the Hugo static site builder using the Hinode theme, with styling customised for CEDA.
